# walkast

## related functions
* codetools::walkCode
* pryr::ast (NSE wrapper of pryr::call_tree)

```{r, echo = TRUE}
library(pryr); library(codetools); library(walkast)
expr1 <- quote(sum(1, x + y, sin(z * w)))

walkCode(expr1)

call_tree(expr1)

walk_ast(expr1)
```
